original_title: Six Variations on the Same Theme: Second Variation
overview: Six Variations presents six silent short films, each with their own unique visual motif that abstracts, interferes with, and obfuscates an archival reel of Kodachrome home movies. The second variation joins the home movies that unite all six films with an ever-changing mass of digital color: black, white, and rust engulf and swarm the screen, discoloring and hiding the original footage.
title: Six Variations on the Same Theme: Second Variation
